actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide a tax credit for contributions to candidates for Congressional office.

summary.text: Clean Campaign Financing Act of 1991 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit of 50 percent of contributions to congressional candidates. Limits such credit to $100 ($200 in the case of a joint return).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide a tax credit for contributions to candidates for Congressional office.
